name: black vector
description:
In this game you can shoot the enemy, What your highs core?  This is not using a game engine, but a paper js which is a vector JavaScript app. Using react for the menu.

Controls

 [W], [A], [S], [D] or Arrow keys.

[space] to stop movement.

[mouse1] to shoot.

This game was bootstrapped with Create React App and Paper JS.

-------------

GitHub:  https://github.com/Kivylius/black-vector
